hero.headerTag: Inova AI Chatbot for Sales and Support
hero.title: Convert Visitors to Buyers
hero.description: Inova AI Chatbot seamlessly integrates with your website to provide 24/7 lead generation, qualification, and conversion. This AI-driven chatbot engages visitors, understands their needs, and supports 175+ languages, ensuring every interaction is meaningful and productive.

description1.title: Boost Customer Interaction
description1.description: Change the way customers interact with your website. The Inova AI Chatbot proactively engages visitors, captures details, and qualifies leads, ensuring higher conversion rates and better customer satisfaction.

description2.title: Personalized Responses for Informed Decisions
listItems: Engage in meaningful conversations to increase customer lifetime value

description3.title: Achieve Business Goals
listItems: Sales and Booking: Guide customers with product recommendations and booking options.
Upsell or cross-sell based on customer needs
AI Insights: Summarize customer needs and issues for better service.

description4.title: Seamless Integration with Your Tools
description4.description: Integrate Inova AI Chatbot with your favorite tools like Gmail, HubSpot, Salesforce, and more to streamline operations and enhance productivity.
